name: metric_kilograms
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool body_mass_index_bmi_calculator.
Tool description: Use this API to calculate the Body Mass Index of an individual based on their height and weight.
API description: This endpoint will calculate the BMI of an individual using the imperial measurement system.

weight.description: The weight of an individual in kilograms (kg).

height.description: The height of an individual in meters (m).
